The Data Query Builder accepts ADQL input in XML form which should be typed in to the text box. To use this ADQL later in a job step, save the ADQL to MySpace using the 'Save' button. To load an existing ADQL document, use the 'Load' button.
The 'Test' button is in place that you might run your ADQL against a pre-defined DataCenter. You should not use this functionality to run queries. Please use your ADQL as part of a job step.
